column4: Hello guys. I want to change my software repositories back to the original settings, but the server does not show on synaptic options. What command can I use on the terminal to get it done? Also, would "pe.archive.ubuntu/hardy" be the appropiate path?

Hello guys. I want to change my software repositories back to the original settings, but the server does not show on synaptic options. What command can I use on the terminal to get it done? Also, would "pe.archive.ubuntu/hardy" be the appropiate path?
